about_the_game:
Cindy is a young orphan who lives with a stepmother and stepsister, mourning her late father. She is almost used to her low status in the house, but things change with one overheard talk. Cindy discovers that her father is actually alive, and it’s her stepmom Rachel who merely hides him. Now is Cindy’s chance to save her dad by sneaking into the Town Hall to pick up one important letter. And how fortunate that there's a ball tonight! Meanwhile, the Mayor's son, Albert, is furious about his father not attending the ball he has arranged himself. But he has no idea that once he goes down to the party, he will meet her. The one and only… Help two lovebirds to meet and overcome all obstacles. Gather your wits for an unforgettable love story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure!

This Collector's Edition includes:

💘 Engaging Puzzles and Brain Teasers!
Delve into a series of puzzles and brain teasers that not only challenge your mind but also tie directly into the storyline. Each puzzle in these romantic games brings Cindy and Albert closer to their goals, making it a core part of the gameplay!

💘 Think twice!
In this game you can choose a character's phrases for a particular action. Make a fateful decision, on which the development of the story depends. Will you be able to utilize the power of love?

💘 Collection of Magical Elements!
As part of the gameplay in these finding object games, collect magical spells and potions that aid in overcoming challenges and deciphering brain teasers. These elements are crucial in the struggle against the dark forces faced by our protagonists!

💘 Explore a Network of Romance and Mystery!
Uncover a complex array of characters who either help or hinder Cindy and Albert in their quest. The interactions and developments within this network enrich the romance stories, making it one of the most immersive love story games available.
